titleStmt.title: A liuing sadnes, in duty consecrated to the immortal memory of our late deceased albe-loued soueraigne Lord, the peereles paragon of princes, Iames, king of great Brittaine, France and Ireland Who departed this life at his mannour of Theobalds, on Sunday last, the 27. of March, 1625.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. All-de for Henry Gosson,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with imprint "printed by E. Allde for H. Gosson".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
